featured.text: (3) Aggressive, energetic, and willing to learn If you believe you have what it takes to develop this business, please call 2742-6996 C D Wanted: Reporters & Editors Southeastern Travel Services Qualifications: ﹪

definition.zh_def: 資格，通常指某人具備的能力、經驗或學歷，以滿足特定要求或標準。
definition.en_def: Qualifications refer to the skills, experience, or education that make someone suitable for a particular job or activity.
definition.example: Her qualifications include a master's degree in engineering and five years of work experience.
